item.title: Chevron Adds Another Piston to Its US Oil Shale Engine
item.description: Chevron Corp. has agreed to buy Permian Basin oil and gas assets from Noble Energy Inc. for $10.5 billion in cash. The deal would add 149,000 net acres to Chevron’s Permian holdings, bringing its total acreage in the basin to more than 600,000 acres.
